I bought this for a cruise and got so many compliments! It was fun and flirty and great for lounging on deck or strolling through shops. The bright colorful print eliminates the need for accessories. It folded up tightly and resisted wrinkles making it perfect for travel. At the price, I’m considering getting another one in a different color pattern.

For the price, I wasn’t expecting much. I was pleasantly surprised. This dress is SUPER comfortable, soft and flowy. The arms and neck are cut modestly so my bra doesn’t show, but they also aren’t constricting. The print is as shown in the picture, and matches up at the seam. The fabric is lightweight, but heavy enough that I don’t have to worry about the color of my underwear (although the placement of the print also helps). It is flattering and casual for beach or summer. It comes to just above my knee. I’m 5’5”.

I bought three different patterns of this dress for my beach vacation. They are very comfortable, cotton blend and pack very nicely. I usually buy  v necks, however I like these because it protects my chest from the sun. Also I went to the same place a couple of years ago and bought some polyester dresses and cover-up. I could not use them. They were way to hot to wear. Colors and patterns are just like the show in the pictures.I bought the large and I washed them in warm/hot water. Very little shrinkage.
Wanted to find a classier cover up for my swimsuit and this fits the bill perfectly.  True to size, and the material is soft and flowy!
